paragraph.heading:
Dendrobium lindleyi Steud., Nomencl. Bot .
, ed. 2, 1: 490, 1840

subSubSection.paragraph:
Heterotypic synonyms:
Dendrobium aggregatum Roxb., Fl. Ind.
ed. 1832 , 3: 477, 1832, nom. illeg. [non Kunth 1816].
Callista aggregata (Roxb.) Kuntze, Revis.
Gen . Pl.
2: 654, 1891, nom. illeg. Type:â€” MYANMAR . Northern Rakhine State : Pierard s.n. ( holotype : not located; icon. Roxburgh 1289 CAL; copy K).

Specimens examined:â€”
MANDALAY . Pyinoolwin District :
1035 m
,
8 Apr 1940
,
Dickason 9637
( AMES )
.
SHAN . Taunggyi District : fide Moore (1895: 171 ; as
D. aggregatum
); Kengtung District :
23 Apr 1940
,
Dickason 9700
( AMES )
.
KAYIN . Unspecified : fide
Aung et al. (2020: 79)
.
RAKHINE . Unspecified :
Wallich , Numer. List : no. 7411 A
( K-W )
;
same loc.,
Voigt s.n.
( C )
; northern part: type .
BAGO . Taungoo District :
20 Feb 1929
,
Ba Pe 9391
( K , RAF )
.
MON . Thaton District : without collector s.n. (not located, possibly K )
,
fide Hooker (1890a: 750) [as
D. aggregatum
]; Mawlamyine District : 1874,
Parish 13
( K )
.
TANINTHARYI . Myeik District :
Griffith s.n.
( K , P )
.
Also reported from
Kachin State, Sagaing Region, Kayah State and Yangon Region by
Kress et al. (2003: 71
; under
D. aggregatum
), but we have not seen material from these areas.
Distribution:â€” The eastern Himalayas, northeastern India , Myanmar , Thailand , Indochina and southwestern and southern China .

Note:â€” The Dickason 9637 & 9700 collections have small flowers on few-flowered short racemes. We think they belong here rather than to
D. jenkinsii Wall. ex Lindl.

Dendrobium lituiflorum
Lindl., Gard. Chron. 1856: 372
, 1856 [May]. Type :â€” MYANMAR . Without locality: comm. & imp. s.n. ( holotype : K-LINDL)

Homotypic synonym:
Callista lituiflora (Lindl.) Kuntze, Revis.
Gen . Pl.
2: 655, 1891.

Heterotypic synonym:
Dendrobium hanburyanum Rchb.
f.,
Bonplandia
4: 329, 1856 [Oct]. Type:â€” MYANMAR . Without locality: comm. & imp. s.n. ( holotype : W-R 20965).

Specimens examined:â€”
KACHIN . Myitkyina District : without collector s.n. (not located, possibly CAL )
,
fide Pottinger & Prain (1898: 268) ; Bhamo District : comm. & imp. s.n. ( K )
;
same loc.,
150 m
,
Bogg s.n.
in
Maymyo Bot. Gard. 13526
( K )
.
SAGAING . Hkampti District : 2018,
Armstrong et al. 3780
( NY , photos seen), ident. uncertain
.
CHIN . Mindat District :
19 Feb 2009
,
Tanaka 0693
( TNS [s])
.
SHAN . Unspecified : without collector s.n. (not located, possibly CAL )
,
fide Collett & Hemsley (1890: 130) ; same loc.,
1220 m
,
Mar 1888
,
Manders s.n.
( K )
;
same loc.,
Lamington s.n.
( K )
.
BAGO . Pyay District :
Benson s.n.
( K )
.
YANGON . Unspecified : cult. material (not located), fide Hooker (1890a: 740). WITHOUT LOCALITY. Types ;

,

( K )
.
Distribution:â€” The eastern Himalayas, northeastern India , Myanmar , Thailand , Indochina and southwestern and southern China .
